name: Bitless
description:
The Bitless are after you. Run, jump, and scale walls on your way through 50 levels of platforming action!

"Bitless is a precision platformer with a streak of sadism, but it's all the better for it." -Touch Arcade 4.5/5

* 50 intense levels spanning 4 worlds and 3 bosses
* Retro graphics and sound
* Retina support
* Brutally difficult level design
* Intuitive one-touch controls
* Witty dialog
* Game Center
* Support for iPhone 6 and 6+

Check us out and give feedback at http://facebook.com/bitlessthegame
